translation.otp-not-received: If you did not receive the code
translation.email-otp-sent: Enter the One-time Password sent to your email. Please check your spam folder if you do not find the email in your inbox.
translation.email-otp-description: Enter your email address to verify account ownership. You will receive a One-time Password in your inbox.
translation.confirm-password-required: Re-enter your new password to confirm it
translation.login-carousel-text-1: Register your business with ease and get your business up and running in no time
translation.login-carousel-text-2: Register your mortgage with ease and get your business up and running in no time
translation.login-carousel-text-3: Register your insurance with ease and get your business up and running in no time
